metadata.title: Hammont Foil Stamped Gift Bags (12 Pack) Unique Design with Durable Ribbon Handles, Beautiful Treat Bags Best for Birthday, Wedding 9”x 7”x 4” (Golden)
features: THE PERFECT GIFT: No need to break your head over getting creative. With these classy gift bags or goodie bags, it won’t matter what contents are actually inside because the wrapping will just say it all. Out party favor bags give an instant upgrade to any gift you’re giving with its unique and beautiful design on the outside and the quality material all around.

THE SKYS THE LIMIT: These unique and attractive Valentine’s gift bags can be filled with most anything you can think of. Fill these cute gift bags with donuts, muffins, cookies, mini pizzas, mini pies, cheeses, breads, chocolates, scented candles, bath bombs and anything else you can think of. Watch your loved one’s excitement grow when they see the beautiful patterns and rich quality in their reusable gift bag.

THINK ELEGANT: These paper bags can be gifted for all occasions. The beautiful designed gift bags make the perfect bridesmaid bags, groomsmen proposal bags, for engagement parties, baby shower party favors, thank you gifts, birthday gift bags for women, kids party favor bags, wedding gift bags and more.

DIMENSIONS AND PACKAGING: This candy bag measures 9”x7”x4” (23x18x10 cm) and comes with a set of 12 gift bags. Hammonts elegant wedding gift bags are always made of strong and durable paper. The patterned gift bag will wow all your friends and guests and communicate that you’ve got class.

ALL ABOUT EASY: Our paper gift bags with ribbon handles are easy to store, easy to assemble and easy to love. The gift bags ship flat and can easily be stored until you are ready to use them. The quality ribbon handle makes it easy and convenient for your guests to grab and go and for you to deliver it as a package.
description: With our premium quality paper gift bags, your life has just gotten a whole lot easier! Our pastry or charcuterie bag are easy to assemble, easy to store and the best part is you don’t have to spend time smoothing the wrapping paper. The perfect choice for your themed gift package, you can fill these gift boxes with beauty products, breads, cheeses, chocolates, cookies and cakes. No matter what you decide to fill it with the beautifully designed gift bag will add a touch of class to your package and the elegance will speak for itself. Add a touch of elegance to your wedding, baby shower, birthday party or Valentine’s gift and see the gifts value escalate even higher.
